talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Silver Dragon's Forcefield? Wait… The path it…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Because of the size of the vibrations, there's a wide range of areas to look at. While we're checking the nightmare, why don't you examine the Silver Dragon's Forcefield?

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Even the path has changed.)</FONT>All right. I'll get going.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
What, have you forgotten the way? Here, I'll mark it for you.
Of course, our Dragon must be keeping an eye on the place, but we need to determine the cause. If there's something as strange as before, we might need your power.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!
<html>$Unexpected Encounter$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>This place… has completely changed! What is going on?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I was beginning to think it was time for you to come, little one.

※This quest cannot be carried out in a party.

$Velskud$
There was a massive tremor that shook the entire barrier. The Goddess's dream has changed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Rearranged… Is that what happened in <FONT color=#086171>Saint Haven</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
You always have such useless worries, kid. The barrier is perfectly fine. Space has simply been rearranged.

$Velskud$
Of course there have been changes there too. Isn't that why you came to see me?

${user_nick}$
(You tell Velskud what Priestess of Darkness Shea said and about the changes in Saint Haven.)
The king and I are the only ones who recognize the situation.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(The whole dream moved, and even the station got caught up in it...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I'm not surprised. That's how humans are. The things that surround them have changed completely, yet they don't even see it. They carry on as calmly as fish in a fishbowl.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The whole dream has moved, but why has Saint Haven changed?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Lagendia can change at any time according to the Goddess's dreams. This time the change was so enormous that the entirety of space is shaking in the aftereffects. It's because the whole dream has moved.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There's the palace. And the Goddess statue….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I really do need to point out everything one by one, don't I? Think about it, kid. What's in Saint Haven?

$Velskud$
That's not bad, but keep going. I'm talking about the Goddess's dream.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The Garden of Time and Space has collapsed, but….</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yes. TheGarden of Time and Space is a place for collecting and monitoring the Goddess's nightmares. Of course, the place is greatly influenced by dreams.

$Velskud$
And why did it collapse?

${user_nick}$
So, because Labynia haphazardly fashioned and separated the fabric of space... the Goddess's nightmare is replicated and amplified.

$Velskud$
Yeah, they're being taken under control or destroyed little by little, but they're still having an adverse effect.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So that's why this place has changed, too.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
The Garden of Time and Space, the Labyrinth, the Storm of Time and Space… Think about it. Saint Haven is on the front line of the nightmare.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Ah, what should I do? It feels like a devastating change is coming.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yeah. It's the same problem. Even if the barrier blocks the nightmare's energy from flowing into the open Monolith, the change in dreams is bound to appear most intensely here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But we don't know what changes are coming to the world next.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Your face tells me you're needlessly feeling pressure again. Kid, there's nothing you can do. Forget about it.

$Velskud$
Why, are you worried?

${user_nick}$
I can't help but worry about the fact that our world might be shaken again after barely securing a new future...

$Velskud$
I keep saying it, but it's nothing for you to worry about, really. Wait, what's that now?

${user_nick}$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
... Huh? What? What is this?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Priestess of Darkness Shea$
Thank you. Take care!

$Geraint$
How… strange. I never would have expected a child of humanity to come here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Geraint! It's Geraint, but he doesn't recognize me!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
… Come to think of it, you are a child of humanity, and yet not at the same time. Fragment of Chaos, I never expected to meet you in a place like this.

$Geraint$
My mission dictates that I kill you. I believe that you, as a Dragon, must also understand this mission. Do you have anything to say?

${user_nick}$
Wait, Geraint! I'm {user_class} {user_nick}. This jewel is not mine, but Red Dragon Rubinart's! I think I may have traveled back in time. And I also have a gem of the ancients in my body!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(This is the first time you've ever felt scared of him...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
What you say is difficult to understand. But……
(Geraint is staring at you.)

$Geraint$
I see. You are right. You are a complex being. You have a strong jewel, yet it is not that of a dragon... It is the jewel of a human girl, but, yet again, this a different being entirely. Let me hear your story.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I entered the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and somehow ended up here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
This place is a dream within a dream of the Goddess. But how did you come to possess a jewel of the Red Dragon?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(That's right, the only Silver Dragon Geraint knows of is Argenta.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Silver Dragon's Forcefield…? I hadn't heard that Argenta built a nest…

$Geraint$
But I can smell her from you. Besides, if you were able to enter the nest, she must have allowed it. I'm sorry. I almost killed you without hearing about your childhood.

${user_nick}$
(So, Geraint was right. This must be what he was trying to tell me...)
I, it's okay. But… A dream within a dream?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If this place is a shadow of the past, does that mean you are a shadow too, Geraint?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Sure. A dream within a dream of the Goddess, the deepest part of her dream. As Argenta said, it could be called a shadow of the past.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(He might just be a shadow. But if this Geraint is not a shadow of the past… perhaps...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
It sounds like from your point of view that is so. But it is a difficult question for me to readily answer from my perspective.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Geraint, I have something to tell you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Why the long face, bearer of the jewel?

$Geraint$
(All of a sudden, a whirlwind envelops {user_nick}'s body.)
Time and space have been distorted. What a shame. I tried to extract you.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_05.ogg}{action:Talk}
This is ancient Saint Haven. What in the world has happened…? Eltia? Eltia!

$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_04.ogg}
{user_nick}! You're here, too? Why are we all here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I had the same experience. If we all put our heads together, we'll find the answer.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_02.ogg}
No one knew that Saint Haven had changed, and now there's no one in the city!
(Charlotte looks like she's about to break down and cry.)

$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_03.ogg}
What do we do? I can't believe we're stuck here! I'm so hungry!

${user_nick}$
Yeah, but... But if you don't calm down and think about how we're going to get out, we won't find any answers.

$Lancea Charlotte$
Ugh, I suppose so!

${user_nick}$
And isn't there always a silver lining in any situation? For example, there's no one here. At least there aren't more victims.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Oh, you could think of it like that... But if what Geraint said is true...)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte$
That's right. There's no one here! What if someone kidnapped everyone?! Maybe they're trapped somewhere, and maybe we should save them!

${user_nick}$
That's not the case. It's still a theory, but according to what heard on the way here, this place is a dream within a dream.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It seems that way. That's probably why there aren't any people here.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte$
A dream within a dream? So this place isn't really the old Saint Haven?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>There you go. Let's start by thinking about the positives.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte${sound:npc_len_q3865_01.ogg}
I see! Well, I'm glad His Majesty is not here. But how do we get out?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(After finishing the conversation, Lancea just stares at the wall. You should go speak with someone else for now.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Lancea Charlotte$
I'll do some thinking about how to get out! Maybe we can break this wall?! I'll have to think about that!

$Velskud$
Grab my hand! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Lancea Charlotte$
I'll do some thinking about how to get out! Maybe we can break this wall?! I'll have to think about that!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(What is that supposed to mean?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Machina${action:Talk}{sound:npc_mac_q3868_02.ogg}
It's strange. Everyone who has come here feels something.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, I had the exact same experience!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Machina${sound:npc_mac_q3868_01.ogg}
Were you aware Saint Haven had changed? It was frustrating because no one knew but me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Come to think of it, Lancea was also aware.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Machina$
See? Only the people who have come here felt that. I thought only hybrids saw it, not humans... But it was strange because it seemed like the king knew.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(It's an unsettling prospect to consider, but I think it makes sense. Still...….)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Machina$
Is that why we're here? Maybe we were dragged here because we knew. Maybe someone was trying to drive us out of the world... I've been looking around here for a while.

$Machina${sound:npc_mac_q3868_03.ogg}
There's no way out of here. Even if it seems like we can leave, no one has been able to. Did someone lock us away here?

${user_nick}$
(As Machina said, we're the only ones here. There's plenty of reason to think negatively, and Geraint said he felt bad for us, but... Why don't I feel more frightened?)

${user_nick}$
(Somehow, I feel safe here, and I think there's a reason.)

${user_nick}$
(This time it's different from Mobius. I feel like I'm where I should be, where I should have come. And I even feel warm and cozy.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Considering it's known as a <FONT color=#a82424>dream within a dream</FONT>, that could be the case.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Machina${sound:npc_mac_q3868_04.ogg}
My sole focus is on going back. We have to wait until the Goddess's dream changes, right?

$Velskud$
Grab my hand! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

$Machina${sound:npc_mac_q3868_04.ogg}
My sole focus is on going back. We have to wait until the Goddess's dream changes, right?

$Velskud$
Kid! What are you doing here!

$Velskud$
So, there's a whole gang of you here...
You're lucky your very existence hasn't been eradicated, coming all the way here. You must go back to where you came from!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'm sorry. I couldn't get a good grip of your hand earlier, so I got swept away.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Do you have any idea where this is? You're in a dream within a dream. The most dangerous place of all.

$Velskud$
… Forget it. I'm the one who's to blame for your failure. I think you've let your guard down riding my coattails all the time. Here.
(Velskud extends his hand.)

$Velskud$
Unless you want to spend a thousand years here, grab my hand. You'll have to keep your wits about you to avoid being swept away.

$Velskud$
Grab my hand! What are you waiting for!

$Velskud$
How far should I reach my hand?!

※You cannot continue while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(So this place… is the Silver Dragon's... Forcefield)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
...
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅰ
journal.contents:
Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.
It's true that a huge transformation has occurred, but you don't know why, or how it has affected the rest of the world. Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield and find out what's going on.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅱ
journal.contents:
Speak with Geraint.
After falling into the cracks created by the distortions in Time and Space, you see someone who shouldn't exist right in front of you. Talk to Geraint.

Cristal Stream - Geraint

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅲ
journal.contents:
Speak with Lancea Charlotte.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Geraint. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Lancea Charlotte

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅳ
journal.contents:
Speak with Machina.
You were swept up by another whirlwind before you could have a proper conversation with Geraint. This time you were suddenly dropped into a new location. Will the whirlwind appear here too? Speak with the people here for now.

Old Saint Haven-Machina

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅴ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
As you were speaking with the others and beginning to fall into the abyss of despair, Velskud appeared before you. Is he, like Geraint, part of the Goddess's dream within a dream that appeared for but an instance? Speak with him and find out.

Old Saint Haven-Velskud

journal.title: Unexpected Encounter Ⅵ
journal.contents:
Speak with Velskud.
You escaped the Old Saint Haven, the dream within a dream. Velskud is looking your way silently. Talk to Velskud in the Silver Dragon's Forcefield.

Silver Dragon's Forcefield-Velskud
